metadata.title: CVE-2018-11243 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: PackLinuxElf64::unpack in p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.95 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (double free), limit the ability of a malwarescanner to operate on the entire original data, or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
